abstract: Microsoft will allow Xbox 360 owners to watch programming they are paying for separately through Comcast, Verizon or another TV service provider.
snippet: Microsoft will allow Xbox 360 owners to watch programming they are paying for separately through Comcast, Verizon or another TV service provider.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft on Wednesday announced the dawning of a "new era" of television. The actual announcement doesn't amount to nearly that much, but it is worth noting for what it says about our TV habits.

headline.main: Xbox Is Now a TV Box
